description:
Rittgers & Rittgers has a history of success spanning decades in the area of personal injury, criminal defense and family law cases. We are respected by other lawyers, judges, and within the local community. We are frequently asked to represent other lawyers and their family members, and are often asked to co-counsel cases with other law firms.

Personal injury and wrongful death

Our plaintiff personal injury team has achieved significant verdicts and settlements in cases other lawyers refused to accept. We have obtained several multimillion-dollar recoveries for families who suffered because of the careless behavior of corporations and other people. We are passionate about helping people, and work hard to hold insurance companies and corporations responsible.

Criminal defense and OVI

The criminal defense attorneys at Rittgers & Rittgers handle some of the high-profile cases in southern Ohio and have a history of success in jury trials when favorable plea bargains are not offered. Our attorneys have achieved not guilty verdicts in cases, including murder, OVI, domestic violence and sex offense charges, where no plea bargain was offered by the prosecutor. We will hold the government to its burden and vigorously defend the accused.

Family law and divorce

We frequently handle high net worth divorce cases with business evaluation. We also handle collaborative divorce cases. We treat each other and our clients like family. We know that when a person calls an attorney it is usually one of the most stressful times a person will experience.

Office locations

Rittgers & Rittgers has three main office locations: Lebanon, Ohio (Warren County), Cincinnati, Ohio (Hamilton County), and Oxford, Ohio (Butler County). We also have smaller office locations throughout Southwest Ohio and northern Kentucky.

Cincinnati

Rittgers & Rittgers in Cincinnati, Ohio, is proud of our law firm's long history of successfully representing clients in personal injury, criminal defense and family law cases. Other attorneys frequently ask us to co-counsel their own cases with them, as well as to represent them and their families.

Personal injury and wrongful death

Our law firm's personal injury attorneys have a passion for helping people, and have obtained numerous multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlements for our clients who have suffered personal injury and/or wrongful death due to corporations' and other people's negligence. We often win cases against insurance companies that other attorneys refused to take.

Criminal defense and OVI

Our criminal defense and OVI attorneys likewise have a long successful history of achieving acquittals for our clients after they were arrested and charged with such crimes as murder, OVI, sex offenses or domestic violence. We have handled some of southern Ohio's most high-profile cases and have favorably concluded numerous jury trials.

Family law and divorce

Our law firm understands that when our clients face a divorce or another family law issue, it is a very stressful period in their lives. Our family law attorneys have the knowledge, skill and experience to handle all types of divorces from collaborative to high-asset divorces to those requiring business evaluations.

Convenient office locations

In addition to our Cincinnati location that serves our Hamilton County clients, Rittgers & Rittgers also maintains an office in Lebanon that serves our Warren County clients and another office in Oxford that serves our Butler County clients. In addition, we have several satellite offices throughout southwestern Ohio and northern Kentucky.
